Questions.question: Are you currently experiencing any FEVER and/or CHILLS?
Questions.hint: Temperature of 37.8 degrees Celcius (100 degrees Fahrenheit) or higher

Questions.question: Are you currently experiencing any COUGH or BARKING COUGH (croup)?
Questions.hint: Continuous, more than usual, making a whistling noise when breathing (not related to asthma, post-infectious reactive airways, COPD, or other known causes or conditions you already have)

Questions.question: Are you currently experiencing any SHORTNESS OF BREATH?
Questions.hint: Out of breath, unable to breathe deeply (not related to asthma or other known causes or conditions you already have)

Questions.question: Are you currently experiencing any DECREASE or LOSS OF TASTE OR SMELL?
Questions.hint: Not related to seasonal allergies, neurological disorders, or other known causes or conditions you already have

Questions.question: Are you currently experiencing any MUSCLE ACHES or JOINT PAIN?
Questions.hint: Unusual, long-lasting (not related to getting a COVID-19 vaccine in the last 48 hours, a sudden injury, fibromyalgia, or other known causes or conditions you already have)

Questions.question: Are you currently experiencing any EXTEREME TIREDNESS?
Questions.hint: Unusual, fatigue, lack of energy (not related to getting a COVID-19 vaccine in the last 48 hours, depression, insomnia, thyroid dysfunction, or other known causes or conditions you already have)

Questions.question: In the last 14 days, have you travelled outside of Canada and been told to quarantine (per the federal quarantine requirements)?
Has a doctor, health care provider, or public health unit told you that you should currently be isolating (staying at home)?
Questions.hint: This can be because of an outbreak or contact tracing.

Questions.question: In the last 10 days, have you tested positive on a rapid antigen test or home-based self-testing kit?
Questions.hint: If you have since tested negative on a lab-based PCR test, select No.
